bcbioRnaseq

Sample Metrics

Sample Metrics

metrics(object)

# S4 method for bcbioRNADataSet
metrics(object)

Arguments

object

Object.

Value

data.frame.

Examples

data(bcb)
metrics(bcb)
#>          sample_id sample_name group average_insert_size duplicates
#> group1_1  group1_1    group1_1  ctrl                   0          0
#> group1_2  group1_2    group1_2  ctrl                   0          0
#> group2_1  group2_1    group2_1    ko                   0          0
#> group2_2  group2_2    group2_2    ko                   0          0
#>          duplication_rate_of_mapped exonic_rate intergenic_rate intronic_rate
#> group1_1                  0.5574675      0.8590          0.0663        0.0747
#> group1_2                  0.5890465      0.8820          0.0599        0.0581
#> group2_1                  0.5772400      0.8632          0.0661        0.0707
#> group2_2                  0.5828299      0.8713          0.0635        0.0652
#>          mapped_paired_reads mapped_reads     name quality_format    r_rna
#> group1_1                   0     22062337 ctrl_f_1       standard 42218.64
#> group1_2                   0     25852621 ctrl_f_4       standard 48275.49
#> group2_1                   0     25172084   ko_f_1       standard 38893.78
#> group2_2                   0     25100941   ko_f_6       standard 40831.69
#>           r_rna_rate sequence_length sequences_flagged_as_poor_quality
#> group1_1 0.002069408           25-75                                 0
#> group1_2 0.001970088           25-75                                 0
#> group2_1 0.001665623           25-75                                 0
#> group2_2 0.001737246           25-75                                 0
#>          total_reads x_gc x5_3_bias
#> group1_1    22339941   48      1.01
#> group1_2    26168288   48      1.04
#> group2_1    25490090   47      1.00
#> group2_2    25399483   48      0.98
